revised_title: The Medicinal Effects of Poisonous Plants: A Case Study of Oenanthe Crocata
tldr: The author documents a case study of a patient suffering from a skin disorder who found relief after consuming the juice of the poisonous plant Oenanthe crocata, also known as hemlock dropwort, instead of water parsnip. The patient experienced nausea, sickness, and vomiting but eventually saw significant improvement in their condition.
